scripts.build: mkdir -p build && esbuild index.tsx --bundle --outfile=build/index.js --format=esm --minify --external:react --external:react-dom --external:react-router-dom --external:lucide-react --external:recharts && cp index.html build/ && cp metadata.json build/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp -r public/* build/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.start: echo 'Use a local development server that supports TSX or run the build script.'
